SEARCH
Module io.github.ascopes.jct
Package io.github.ascopes.jct.containers.impl

Class OutputContainerGroupImpl

java.lang.Object
io.github.ascopes.jct.containers.impl.AbstractPackageContainerGroup
io.github.ascopes.jct.containers.impl.OutputContainerGroupImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ContainerGroup, ModuleContainerGroup, OutputContainerGroup, PackageContainerGroup, Closeable, AutoCloseable
@API(since="0.0.1", status=INTERNAL) public class OutputContainerGroupImpl extends AbstractPackageContainerGroup implements OutputContainerGroup
A group of containers that relate to a specific output location.

These can contain packages and modules of packages together, and thus are slightly more complicated internally as a result.

Since:
0.0.1
Author:
Ashley Scopes

    • getFileForOutput

      @Nullable public @Nullable PathFileObject getFileForOutput(String packageName, String relativeName)
      Description copied from interface: PackageContainerGroup
      Get a FileObject that can have content written to it for the given file.

      This will attempt to write to the first writeable path in this group. null will be returned if no writeable paths exist in this group.

      Specified by:
      getFileForOutput in interface PackageContainerGroup
      Parameters:
      packageName - the name of the package the file is in.
      relativeName - the relative name of the file within the package.
      Returns:
      the FileObject to write to, or null if this group has no paths that can be written to.
